channel.title: Idea for RuneScape
channel.description:
They should make it so instead of "godwars" dungeon there is a "war" type of game. You choose which side you wish to be on, and credits are gathered via killing the other side.
-this would be a safe minigame. This way teams that go to bosses would be able to gain kc at a fairer rate.

item.title: Idea for RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

W/e the idea is still ridiculous.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“mihalich, post:29, topic:432590”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=535303.msg3914596#msg3914596 date=1329054591]
See now your not making sense lol. Normally clans that have lower levels are community clans not PvM clans. Community clans do overall a little of everything.
[/quote]
Shouldn’t pvm with level 90s regardless.[/quote]community clans they don’t care about levels.

item.title: Idea for RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:26, topic:432590”]^ not entirely so

I myself have been in several clans where the 120’s/130’s will get done before the 80’s/90’s and we would be like" hurry up we are going to need everybody to crash this party" etc.[/quote]
Being in a clan that does pvm with levels 90s is a waste.

Read full topic

item.description:

^ not entirely so

item.title: Idea for RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:23, topic:432590”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=535303.msg3914054#msg3914054 date=1329007379]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=535303.msg3914014#msg3914014 date=1329006114]

Still doesn’t make any sense since its not hard to get KC to begin with.
[/quote]It is harder for the lower levels who team with the higher levels. For example, a clan that has a 80 cb requirement may go to bandos or something. The high levels will be done 3x as fast as the 80 combat members.

and making content that was intended for higher levels all of a sudden cater to lower levels is fair because…

Plus its not hard to kill the goblins or just train your stats up and stop being ignorant.
[/quote]You obviously don’t understand what I am getting at. The team KC is only there to help keep clans together not to break them up by level.[/quote]
Most clans are broken apart by levels for a reason and that is so low levels or those who don’t have certain stats don’t drag the team down…this idea sucks.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea for RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:

[quote="-Nothing, post:6, topic:432590"][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=535303.msg3913638#msg3913638 date=1328988130]
That’s not fun. It would be fun if you can get random Godwars items from drops like very 50 kills or so.
[/quote]
Looks like we got a casual kiddo here who wants everything handed to him in a golden plate.[/quote]
dud bck off mai babe. <3

I like godwars how it is, not overkill o.o

Read full topic

You choose which side you wish to be on, and credits are gathered via killing the other side.

-this would be a safe minigame. This way teams that go to bosses would be able to gain kc at a fairer rate.
[/quote]

hmm, like you go into (just say) a portal and you are put on a team. after that the two teams are lined up and charge at eachother? And the most points after a set amount of time wins?

^^imma try and code something like that
